name: AON3D
headline: Additive Manufacturing with advanced materials
description:
AON3D is a rapidly growing startup on a mission to put industrial 3D printing capabilities into the hands of those who need it most. Our technology has made it 10 times cheaper than before to 3D print with advanced thermoplastics, and we continue to push the boundaries on commercializing new materials for 3D printing. 

Our customers span the globe and are pioneers in the application of 3D printing in their field – from automotive tooling to aircraft interiors, foundry molds to public art installations, prosthetics to guides for radiation and surgical oncology.  

AON3D is a graduate of Y-Combinator and venture-backed by top investors from Silicon Valley.

# Meet Hylo™
## AON3D's new flagship industrial 3D printer powered by **Basis™** , our machine learning-driven software.
[Learn More](https://www.aon3d.com/</hylo/>)
## More Than Hardware, AON3D Helps Businesses Succeed.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/us-air-force.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/blue-origin.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/nasa.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/astrobotic.png)

![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/us-army.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/l3-tech.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/rc-cnr.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/fermilab.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/energy.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/kimya.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cp-infinite.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/xerox.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/solvay.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/sdbic.webp)

![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/mcgill.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/uni-toronto.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/state-north-carolina.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/uni-new-mexico.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/uni-texas.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/uni-york.png)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/nm-state-uni.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/vt.webp)
We believe next generation software and smart hardware are key to unlocking and scaling additive manufacturing adoption, enabling users to create functional parts in the world's most advanced polymers with just a few clicks.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Aon3D-Insitu-Hero-copy.webp) ![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rectangle-62-mobile-min.jpg)
## The AON3D Advantage
High-quality, North American made hardware combined with intelligent software allows engineers to achieve high performance parts, in any material, with the touch of a button.
Get consistent part properties and high isotropy across the entire build volume, production runs, and printers.
### Open Additive
Configurability is a right, not an upgrade — open materials, open settings, open access to process data.
### Seamless Experience
With intelligent software and smart hardware, AON3D delivers a seamless, integrated, and easy user experience.
### Reliable Results
Machine learning-driven software and advanced process monitoring deliver reliable, repeatable, and quality-verified parts.
### Return on Investment
Avoid proprietary materials, expensive material licenses, hardware upgrades, and software subscriptions that diminish ROI.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/ecosystem-min-2-scaled.jpg)
## OPEN INDUSTRIAL
Our vision is to build an open ecosystem.
One that allows you to successfully use whatever material you want from whichever manufacturer. 
One that gives you insight into process parameters and sensor data. One that empowers engineers and designers – from all sizes of companies – to innovate faster without forced, commercialized boundaries or the risks of singular supply chains.
### Open Materials
Unrestricted access to use whatever materials you want from any supplier.
### Open Controls
Modify material process parameters, temperature, and motion settings.
### Open Knowledge
Access to our support team and expert material science consultation.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rectangle-64-min-1.jpg)
## Our Platform
Through machine learning-assisted process optimization, automated hardware, and advanced in-process monitoring and inspection, AON3D turns process variability into part confidence.
### Smart Hardware
Print large, fast, accurately and repeatably with 25+ integrated sensors for automated calibration, process control and monitoring.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Front-Center-Light-copy-2-scaled.webp)
[See Hardware](https://www.aon3d.com/</hylo/>)
### Intelligent Software
Manage, prepare, optimize, and qualify parts with machine learning and advanced process data.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Basis-Interface-v3-scaled.webp)
[See Software](https://www.aon3d.com/</basis/>)
### High Performance Materials
From engineering grade materials to the world's strongest and most advanced polymers, choose the materials you want, with the properties applications need.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Spool-1.webp)
[See Materials](https://www.aon3d.com/</additive-manufacturing-materials/>)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Front-Center-Light-copy-2-scaled.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Basis-Interface-v3-scaled.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Spool-1.webp)

We believe next generation software and smart hardware are key to unlocking and scaling additive manufacturing adoption, enabling users to create functional parts in the world's most advanced polymers with just a few clicks.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Aon3D-Insitu-Hero-copy.webp) ![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rectangle-62-mobile-min.jpg)
## The AON3D Advantage
High-quality, North American made hardware combined with intelligent software allows engineers to achieve high performance parts, in any material, with the touch of a button.
Get consistent part properties and high isotropy across the entire build volume, production runs, and printers.
### Open Additive
Configurability is a right, not an upgrade — open materials, open settings, open access to process data.
### Seamless Experience
With intelligent software and smart hardware, AON3D delivers a seamless, integrated, and easy user experience.
### Reliable Results
Machine learning-driven software and advanced process monitoring deliver reliable, repeatable, and quality-verified parts.
### Return on Investment
Avoid proprietary materials, expensive material licenses, hardware upgrades, and software subscriptions that diminish ROI.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/ecosystem-min-2-scaled.jpg)
## OPEN INDUSTRIAL
Our vision is to build an open ecosystem.
One that allows you to successfully use whatever material you want from whichever manufacturer. 
One that gives you insight into process parameters and sensor data. One that empowers engineers and designers – from all sizes of companies – to innovate faster without forced, commercialized boundaries or the risks of singular supply chains.
### Open Materials
Unrestricted access to use whatever materials you want from any supplier.
### Open Controls
Modify material process parameters, temperature, and motion settings.
### Open Knowledge
Access to our support team and expert material science consultation.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rectangle-64-min-1.jpg)
## Our Platform
Through machine learning-assisted process optimization, automated hardware, and advanced in-process monitoring and inspection, AON3D turns process variability into part confidence.
### Smart Hardware
Print large, fast, accurately and repeatably with 25+ integrated sensors for automated calibration, process control and monitoring.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Front-Center-Light-copy-2-scaled.webp)
See Hardware⟨28⟩
### Intelligent Software
Manage, prepare, optimize, and qualify parts with machine learning and advanced process data.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Basis-Interface-v3-scaled.webp)
See Software⟨29⟩
### High Performance Materials
From engineering grade materials to the world's strongest and most advanced polymers, choose the materials you want, with the properties applications need.
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Spool-1.webp)
See Materials⟨30⟩
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Front-Center-Light-copy-2-scaled.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Basis-Interface-v3-scaled.webp)
![](https://www.aon3d.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Spool-1.webp)

generated_description:
**AON3D Summary**

**Overview**:  
Established in 2015 and a graduate of Y Combinator (Batch W17), AON3D is a dynamic startup based in Montreal, Canada. Their mission? To democratize industrial 3D printing by enabling easier access to advanced materials. They’ve made impressive strides, making additive manufacturing ten times cheaper, thus propelling the industry forward.

**What They Do**:  
AON3D specializes in high-quality industrial 3D printing solutions, focusing on the application of advanced thermoplastics. Their technology is in play across various industries, including automotive, aerospace, medical, and even art. This broad range demonstrates the versatility of their offerings, which include the flagship Hylo™ printer powered by intelligent software and proprietary polymers.

**Key Products and Materials**:  
- **Printers**: Their main products include the Hylo™ 3D printer, AON M2+, and the software platform Basis, which utilizes machine learning for optimal printing.
- **Materials**: AON3D offers a range of materials such as ULTEM™ 9085, Nylon (PA), PEEK, and more, providing users with options suitable for demanding applications.

**Team and Culture**:  
The AON3D team is shy of 40 members. Their expertise doesn't just lie in hardware; they emphasize creating a comprehensive ecosystem where technology meets user needs seamlessly. AON3D's approach involves open systems, ensuring that users can work with a variety of materials without restrictive licenses or proprietary barriers.

**Investors**:  
AON3D has garnered attention from high-profile venture capitalists in Silicon Valley, highlighting confidence in their innovative approach and market potential.

**Website**:  
For more information, access their site at [aon3d.com](https://www.aon3d.com).

**Conclusion**:  
In a landscape where advanced manufacturing is crucial, AON3D stands out not just for their hardware but for their visionary ecosystem that empowers businesses to innovate without constraints. Their commitment to open technologies and cost-effective 3D printing positions them as a key player in the ongoing evolution of manufacturing. If you're looking to harness the power of advanced materials in a flexible, affordable way, AON3D offers a promising solution.

In the realm of additive manufacturing, they're not just making parts; they're shaping the future of the industry.
